text: Emanuel Bilbao (born 3 November 1989) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Alvarado. ==Club career== After a stint with Almaceneros, Bilbao joined Olimpo. Despite being a first-team member between 2008 and 2014, he didn't make a senior appearance for the club across seasons in the Primera División and Primera B Nacional. During his time with Olimpo, Bilbao had separate loan spells with Liga de Fútbol de Río Colorado outfit Independiente. On 11 February 2015, Bilbao joined Guillermo Brown of Primera B Nacional. He was an unused substitute forty-one times in 2015, before making his professional bow in April 2016 against Instituto. A further twenty-eight appearances in all competitions followed across the next three campaigns. In June 2018, fellow second tier team Quilmes signed Bilbao. His debut arrived on 27 August against Atlético de Rafaela. ==International career== Bilbao received a call-up from Sergio Batista to train with the Argentina U20s in 2008. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="8"|Olimpo |2008–09 |rowspan="2"|Primera B Nacional |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2009–10 |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2010–11 |rowspan="2"|Primera División |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2011–12 |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2012–13 |rowspan="1"|Primera B Nacional |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2013–14 |rowspan="2"|Primera División |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2014 |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !0!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!0!!0 |- |rowspan="5"|Guillermo Brown |2015 |rowspan="4"|Primera B Nacional |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2016 |11||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||11||0 |- |2016–17 |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||4||0 |- |2017–18 |12||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||14||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !27!!0!!2!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!29!!0 |- |rowspan="1"|Quilmes |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Primera B Nacional |9||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||9||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !36!!0!!2!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!38!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires Province Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Primera B Nacional players Category:Olimpo footballers Category:Guillermo Brown footballers Category:Quilmes footballers Category:Club Atlético Alvarado players
